dt2.14:1.1_1: te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.14:1.2_0: Te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.14:1.4_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.14:2.6_1: te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.14:2.7_0: Te dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā ekena khandhena ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.

dt2.14:62.6_0: te dhammā asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.14:62.8_0: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.14:63.5_1: te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.14:63.6_0: Te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā.
dt2.14:63.8_0: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
